entry.title: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Subscription Upgrade process
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 26, 18:00 UTC  -  Apr 27, 00:00 UTC

End time : 27/04/2022 00:00 UTC

Service improvement : This operation aims to optimize the performance.

entry.title: [FR][OverTheBox] - OverTheBox service
entry.content:
Apr 11, 18:40 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 11/04/2022 13:45 UTC
End Time : 11/04/2022 18:05 UTC
Service impact : OverTheBox services are back in order.
Root cause : A service that created instability inside our core network, rendering some leaf server unusable.

Apr 11, 14:51 UTC
Update - UPDATE: The issue has been identified and a fix is applied. The service is now back in order.
Our teams remain fully engaged to understand the root cause of the incident. Sorry for any inconvenience caused

Access are going up. We are following the evolution

Apr 11, 09:12 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 11/04/2022 08:32 UTC

Ongoing actions : We are currently investigating the cause of this incident.

entry.title: [Spain][VOIP] - Interconnect
entry.content:
Apr 6, 09:30 UTC
Identified - Start time : 2022/03/28 16:03 UTC
Service impact : Folowing this incident Incident link we now have an issue with some Spanish numbers. They end up with an Unassigned number error.
There are a number of numbers that cannot be reached. This is not related to a signaling defect but to a routing defect of some operators to these numbers.
Ongoing actions : We have opened tickets with 2 operators to correct the problem.
Unfortunately the main protagonist Telefonica complicates things and does not respond willingly to the problems reported. We will get back to you with updates soon

entry.title: [France][Over the box] - Upgrade campaign
entry.content:
Apr 4, 09:23 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Feb 8, 10:15 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jan 19, 21:06 UTC
Scheduled - Start time :08/02/2022 10:15 UTC
End time :04/04/2022 09:15 UTC
Service impact : Short downtime while upgrading system
Service improvement : A few month back, we introduce a new version of our provisionning backend, which is used to setup remote actions on the overthebox device. The previous version is deprecated and existing overthebox need to be migrated toversion v0.6.33. We are planning to start to migrate customer on support level standard from February 8, and Premium customer from February 28.
End of migrations is planned for April 4.

If you wish to upgrade the device on your own, you can follow this guide : https://docs.ovh.com/fr/overthebox/config-upgrade/
